exact_source: minimum aggregate expenditure of A$112,500 across the two Projects within 12 months of completion of the Acquisition; and at least 10 Reverse Circulation (RC) drill holes for a minimum of 100 metres drilled in total on each Project, the costs of which shall be included in calculation of the A$112,500 minimum aggregate expenditure. (A$112,500 * 0.70 USD/AUD = USD 78,750. The 200m drilling commitment, USD 40,000, is part of this A$112,500 spend).
